Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33172110]Dengue virus 2(DENV2):inhibition of viral infection in Vero cells(IC50=7.9 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.33172110]No cytotoxicity against Vero cells up to 1000 μM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: the biding of peptide to virus particles might disrupt the ability of the virus to bind to the host cell receptor or possibly block the internalization of the virus into the host cells.

Literature.Title: Synthetic Bioactive Peptide Derived from the Asian Medicinal Plant Acacia catechu Binds to Dengue Virus and Inhibits Cell Entry.
Literature.Author: Panya A, Sawasdee N, Songprakhon P, Tragoolpua Y, Rotarayanont S, Choowongkomon K, Yenchitsomanus PT.
